name: WarSite
description:
A bad top down shooter made for the AGDS Gamethon (2022), the theme being "Make a Bad Game".

No use of delta time >:)  so your milage may vary when it comes to speed.

Made by:

George Fyles, Emil Harvey, Daniel Wilson, Aaron Durning

WASD to move, mouse to aim + shoot.

We are sorry.
